# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/_export_format.py
@source-hash: 448d3ca52ae6e6d0
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:59:54Z

**Primary Purpose**: Template definitions for exporting Rich console output to HTML and SVG formats, providing structured markup templates for rendering terminal-like content in web browsers.

**Key Constants**:

- `CONSOLE_HTML_FORMAT` (L1-18): HTML template string for exporting console output to HTML format. Contains placeholders for `{stylesheet}`, `{foreground}`, `{background}`, and `{code}`. Uses monospace fonts (Menlo, DejaVu Sans Mono, Consolas, Courier New) to preserve terminal formatting.

- `CONSOLE_SVG_FORMAT` (L20-73): SVG template string for exporting console output as scalable vector graphics. Includes:
  - Fira Code font face definitions for regular (L25-32) and bold (L33-40) weights
  - CSS class definitions with unique ID prefixing for styling isolation
  - SVG structural elements including clipPath definitions and transformation groups
  - Placeholders for dynamic content: `{width}`, `{height}`, `{unique_id}`, `{char_height}`, `{line_height}`, `{styles}`, `{terminal_width}`, `{terminal_height}`, `{lines}`, `{chrome}`, `{terminal_x}`, `{terminal_y}`, `{backgrounds}`, `{matrix}`

- `_SVG_FONT_FAMILY` (L75): Font family constant set to "Rich Fira Code"
- `_SVG_CLASSES_PREFIX` (L76): CSS class prefix constant set to "rich-svg"

**Dependencies**: None - pure template definitions

**Architectural Pattern**: Template-based export system using Python string formatting placeholders. The SVG template uses a matrix-based approach for character positioning, enabling precise control over terminal output rendering.

**Key Design Decisions**:
- Uses web-safe fallback fonts for HTML export
- Implements font loading from CDN for SVG (FiraCode from cdnjs.cloudflare.com)
- Employs unique ID prefixing system to prevent CSS conflicts when multiple exports exist on same page
- SVG template includes clipping paths for proper content boundaries
- Matrix-based character positioning for accurate terminal reproduction
